Module: CDR Drivers

CDR drivers are loaded dynamically (see Modules Configuration). Each loaded CDR driver produce a billing record for each call. More...

Detailed Description

CDR drivers are loaded dynamically (see Modules Configuration). Each loaded CDR driver produce a billing record for each call.
